cboCostEstimates.description: As reported by the House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology on July 14, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 7361, National Weather Service Communications Improvement Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 58 (Friday, April 1, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. FEENSTRA:
H.R. 7361.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the U.S. Constitution
[Page H4127]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

title: National Weather Service Communications Improvement Act
